oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Restoration of the cross at the University of the South
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of restoration of the cross at the University of the South. There is scaffolding around the huge stone cross and men are at the top working.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Crosses; Reconstructions; Men; Scaffolding
